name: Salsa-Sandi
steps: Chop all vegetables. Put tomatoes in blender and puree (unless you like more chunky salsa) Put everything in a very large pot. Cook down 3-4 hours. Add 1/2 c. cornstarch per batch. (Take out a little salsa and stir in cornstarch and then add to pot and simmer. Cold pack for 30 min.
